name: Woocommerce Product Advertisement
author: HIT Tech Market

sections.description:
Introduction

Woocommerce product advertisement plugin helps you to show selected products in Shop, Single Product, Cart and Checkout pages as like advertisement.

Now you can advertise your products, discounts, deals and upcoming offer days in your shop by the help of banner.

Features

HIT Box

  • Best Design for advertisement panel.
  • Change the advertisement Positions.
  • show/hide ads based on pages.
  • Supports all type of products.

HIT Banner

  • Best Design for banner fade.
  • Add banners from external url.
  • Add banners Caption text.
  • Add banners Click Option.
  • show/hide banners based on pages.
  • Supports all type of shop sites.

Pro Version Features

  • Showcase your holiday offers and promotions on commerce platforms like banners.
  • Inform about your offers and promo codes in social media & Email.
  • Create Booking type banners.
  • Create countdown timer Banners.
  • Add Suggestion Product with Order Processing Completed Emails.
  • More Themes and customization for HIT BOX.

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it – you can now configure the plugin.

Is the plugin configuration complicated?

The plugin is very easy to configure and easy to use.

Why we need this plugin?

Product Advertisement plugin gives you the answer for following questions.

How to upsell my business?
How to improve specific product sale?
How to show the new product has arrived?
How to Popup the Product to the customer?
How to advertise my product banners?
How to advertise my offer days?
How to advertise my best discounts?
How to advertise my website deals?
